verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Tell it to Jesus,
tell it to Jesus,
He is a friend
that's well known;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
You've no other
such a friend or brother,
Tell it to Jesus alone.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Are you weary,
are you heavyhearted?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Are you grieving
over joys departed?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Do the tears flow down
your cheeks unbidden?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Have you sins that
to men's eyes are hidden?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Do you fear the gath'ring
clouds of sorrow?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Are you anxious
what shall be tomorrow?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Are you troubled
at the thought of dying?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus;

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
For Christ's coming
kingdom are you sighing?
Tell it to Jesus alone.
